name: Down To Earthworm
description:
Unreal Mega Jam Submission

Team Name 
Fennel

Gameplay Instructions
Use the left controller stick, arrow keys or WASD  to wiggle your way through the earth. Wiggling increases your speed, eat as many things  you can to become bigger.

Gameplay video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3rfTrSHjbbo

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.
All sounds have creative commons 0 license

Sound fx https://freesound.org/
insu -  space rumble
wubitog - crunch
princessmilu -  open mouth chomp
craigsmith - various crashes
dancip - meow sample

Music https://freepd.com/epic.php
Rafael Krux -  cornfield chase
